section.title: Section in the chapter
section.para: Some text regarding the chapter. Ctrl-J to insert a sub section. Ctrl-up 3 times to select the section, then Ctrl-j to insert a new section. Ctrl-up 4 times to select the chapter, then Ctrl-j to insert a new chapter.

You can insert paragraphs just by pressing enter at the end of your text block. Want to bold something? Type it, select it, then use the emphasis[bold] toolbar button. Italic is the same, but just choose emphasis instead.

section.title: Thread Pools
section.para: You define the number of threads that the server will be aloud to start, and the server will start that number of theads when it starts up. When a packet comes in, a thread is requested from the pool. If there is no thread available, a wait period will elapse then an error sent back if there is no thread that can service the request.
